item.description:
In celebration of Darwin Day, Dr. Abby Hafer, Prof. of Anatomy and Physiology at Curry College, will give a talk about animals that no rational designer would ever come up with. Dr. Hafer has given talks before in the Boston area, and they are invariably entertaining and well received. This topic is based on a sermon Dr. Hafer gave to the UU Church in Bedford, and more information can be found in the link below:

http://uubedford.org/spirituality/sermons/900-qanimals-that-shouldnt-exist-according-to-intelligent-designq.html

This event is free and open to the public, and is being hosted by the Disproof Atheism Society.
item.name: Animals that Shouldn't Exist, According to Intelligent Design
